description: Though Vlad Larin looks a bit nervous when he first sees the hulking Dario Leon and Tomas Brand, they both know how to take care of him and ease his concern. We’ve seen the work of Tomas Brand before, and he certainly knows what he’s doing. If you’re in the mood to skip ahead, 38:10 showcases Vlad taking it deep from both ends From Dario and Tomas -- no hole is spared on the blond bottom!
title: Vlad Larin Takes Tomas Brand And Dario Leon At Both Ends
